reviews.review_text:
Nice restaurant on the main  Anjuna road. It has open air and indoor seating. We preferred the inside seating as it was air conditioned. we had gone for lunch. Wasn't busy at all although it was a Saturday in the last week of December.
We liked whatever we ordered
Service was also nice and quick.  The Ambience is interesting with a ot of artworks on display.

Loved the place! We had the Tacos, Burittos, Quesadillas and churros! Definitely visiting again when those Mexican cravings hit back in.
Also, their Tequila based drinks were a beaut, my favourite was the Passion Spritz! The staff are super friendly as well.

If you're in Goa and craving an unforgettable Mexican dining experience, Mexicola is a must-visit. Known for its vibrant ambiance and exceptional service, this restaurant offers a delightful array of dishes and drinks. Whether you're a fan of standout tacos or refreshing mocktails, Mexicola promises a memorable meal in a lively, festive setting.

üå≥ Ambiance: Love how colorful is it. The ambiance at Mexicola is vibrant and festive, characterized by lively and colorful decor inspired by Mexican culture. The restaurant features bright colors, murals, and traditional artifacts, creating an energetic and celebratory atmosphere that enhances the dining experience.

Must-try food:
‚úÖChicken chipotle adobo burrito (Love this!) ‚úÖTenderloin birria taco ‚úÖVegetarian enchiladas ‚úÖBlooming quesadillas
‚úÖVeg quesadilla
‚úÖKidney bean tacos

Must-try drinks: ‚úÖWildberry crush (Love this!) ‚úÖWatermelon and basil lushy

ü§µ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èService: The service at Mexicola is outstanding. I found the staff to be attentive, friendly, and professional, making my dining experience truly enjoyable.

üí∞ Price: Items ranges from Rs.300 - Rs.700

üöò Parking: They have a small parking space that can accommodate 2 cars. There is also free parking on-street (just across the restaurant).

üì∂ Wifi/Network: Vodafone/Idea/Jio network is great.
